item.description:
Hello Everyone -

Guess what?  It's time for our first kayaking adventure of the season. Join us on the Charles River in Newton. It's a short 30 minute drive from the South Shore, right off Route 128 - easy to find and plenty of parking!!!

The trip is a quite leisure 2-3 hour paddle on flat water, great for beginners and beyond.  We'll also stop and take a break or have a snack.

[b]NOTE:[/b] Items to Bring:[list]

*CASH to pay for rental ($15 per hour pp plus tax) - we get a $5 discount if I pay for all

*Must be 18+ - anyone under 21 must be accompanied by an adult family member

*snack/lunch & beverage

*plenty of water

*sunscreen

*hat

*No alcohol

*a smile for a good time

Bringing your own boat:

*need your own PFD, paddle & whistle

*drop boat off at launch before parking for ease of transport

DIRECTIONS -http://www.paddleboston.com/newton/directions.php

WEATHER: Event will be cancelled due to bad weather. Be sure to look @ your emails either Saturday night or Sunday morning for cancellation notice from me.

*SSFMG and its organizers are not responsible for any injuries to participants or damage to kayaks and/or kayak equipment. Personal flotation devices (PFDs) are required for all participants.

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Kayaking on the Charles
